about_the_game:
The “SpellForce 3: Versus Edition - Full PvP Upgrade” DLC contains the complete PvP experience with access to all 6 factions of the SpellForce 3 universe: Orcs, Humans, Elves, Dark Elves, Dwarves, Trolls.

Please note that the full Single Player and story campaign experience is only unlocked by acquiring SpellForce 3 and its stand-alone expansions Soul Harvest and Fallen God.

Key Features

  • Play all of the three base SpellForce 3 factions: Humans, Elves and Orcs
  • Play the two Soul Harvest factions: Dwarves and Dark Elves
  • Play the Troll faction from the Fallen God expansion
  • Enjoy the full PvP multiplayer experience in Ranked, Unranked and AI matches
  • Climb the leaderboard and the faction specific leaderboards to the top
  • Challenge players from all other SpellForce 3 games: SpellForce 3, SpellForce 3: Soul Harvest and SpellForce 3: Fallen God
